NotEnoughBalance().notice: Emitted when the user's balance is lower than requested.

UnauthorizedToken(address).notice: Emitted when the submitted token is not allowed.

UnexpectedCaller(address,address).notice: Emitted when the caller is not the expected address

ZeroAddress().notice: Emitted when the submitted address is the zero address

ZeroValue().notice: Emitted when the submitted value is zero.
